meanings.definition: In a victorious or successful manner
meanings.sent1: After winning the race, she raised her arms triumphantly.
meanings.sent2: The team cheered triumphantly as they scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted triumphantly after catching the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun rose triumphantly over the horizon, signaling a new day.
meanings.sent5: The student beamed triumphantly upon receiving an A on the test.

meanings.sent1: She smiled triumphantly when she saw her artwork displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The child skipped triumphantly after receiving a gold star for good behavior.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail triumphantly after learning a new trick.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed triumphantly in the spring sunshine.
meanings.sent5: He hugged his parents triumphantly after graduating with honors.

meanings.definition: In a way that shows confidence and satisfaction
meanings.sent1: He spoke triumphantly, knowing he had prepared well for the presentation.
meanings.sent2: She walked triumphantly across the stage after giving a successful speech.
meanings.sent3: The chef presented the dish triumphantly, confident in its delicious taste.
meanings.sent4: The artist signed their masterpiece triumphantly, proud of their work.
meanings.sent5: The explorer gazed triumphantly at the mountain peak they had conquered.
